unnormalised: Training regimens are crucial, no? I saw PV Sindhu's intense badminton training once. Seems like 6 hours daily, plus strength conditioning!
normalised: Training regimens are crucial, no? I saw P V Sindhu's intense badminton training once. Seems like six hours daily, plus strength conditioning! Even village kabaddi players in U P train like crazy. Running kilometers on dusty fields. My cousin, Doctor Sharma at A I I M S Delhi, emphasizes customized plans. He says diet matters too, not just gymming in your tiny two hundred square feet room! Costs around rupee five thousand to ten thousand these days to get proper coaching.
